title: IIFL Home Finance aims Rs 7,200 crore home loans with ADB in Telangana, Andhra by 2025 - ETRealty
content: IIFL Home Finance aims Rs 7,200 crore home loans with ADB in Telangana, Andhra by 2025  ETRealty
description: The company said with a total disbursement of Rs 2,448 crore in these two states, it benefitted over 17,000 households as on March 31, 2022.
